about available video analysis providers in legacy format. For new development, use the capability-based endpoints below.
information about all providers with their capabilities.
information about all providers with their capabilities.
Health check endpoint to verify the API is running.

Generate a timeline with scene analysis from a video using selected providers. The API supports both single-provider (legacy) and multi-provider modes. When multiple providers are specified, results are intelligently merged to provide comprehensive scene analysis.
Generate a voiceover script from a timeline.
Generate a voiceover script directly from a video (creates timeline first).
Generate a voiceover script from a shot list (more cinematic approach).
Generate timed voiceover audio segments using TTS.
Mux audio commentary onto the original video.
Generate a summary from a timeline.
Generate a summary directly from a video.
Get detailed capability information for a specific provider.
Get provider recommendations based on desired capabilities.
Check health status of all providers.
Analyze a frame using a specific provider's capabilities.
Get available NVIDIA API functions (requires NVIDIA_API_KEY).
Get the status of any async task.
Get a presigned URL for S3 upload.
Get a presigned URL for S3 download.
Get a list of available test videos.
Get cache and cost optimization statistics.
Set up S3 lifecycle policies for cost optimization.
